synopsis.text:
He aded for a life of normalcy, young Natsumi's world takes a drastic turn when her archaeologist father presents her with a mysterious artifact from New Guinea. Unbeknownst to her, the artifact houses the spirit of Ongo, a mischievous deity of chaos and destruction. Upon accidentally releasing Ongo, Natsumi is thrust into a series of bizarre and magical adventures.

In her dreams, the lecherous Earth god Ahem bestows upon Natsumi the power to control Ongo through the form of the voluptuous flower spirit Mii. The catch? Natsumi must perform an erotic dance to harness Mii's power and quell the chaos unleashed by Ongo.

As Natsumi navigates this newfound responsibility, she encounters old acquaintances of the gods and confronts the enigmatic Nami, a shy girl with hidden abilities. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, Natsumi must embrace her role as Mii and tame the unpredictable Ongo.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
